chunk:
Dehiya Safi Mist, Hydrate (2020 formulation)

Brand: Dehiya

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosa X Centifola (Moroccan Rose) Hydrosol, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Hydrosol, Willow Bark Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Hydrosol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Colloidal Silver, Vegetable Glycerin,

Vegetable Glycerin, Leuconostoc (Radish Root Ferment), Blend of Lentinula Erodes (Shiitake), Grifola Fronds (Maitake), Cordyceps Sinensis (Cordyceps), Ganoderma Lucidum (Reishi) Mushrooms, Hyaluronic Acid, Essential Oil Blend of Rosa Demasca (Rose Absolute), Cymbopogon Martini (Palmarosa) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Chrysopogon Ziz

Oil, Chrysopogon Zizanioides (Vetiver) Oil.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
